translations: v．（非正式）盗窃，入室盗窃：非法进入建筑物，尤指住宅，以窃取财物。
· Someone burgles the house while we were on vacation.
我们度假时，有人闯入房子盗窃。

sentences.sentence: Some locals speculate that Harris-Moore burgles not for the money but to experience the fantasy of the happy home life he never had as a child.
sentences.translation: 一些本地人推测，哈里斯-莫尔盗窃并不是为了金钱，而是为了体验他童年不曾有过的幸福家庭生活。
